subject: Art & Design
title: What Is Typography and Why It Matters
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on What Is Typography and Why It Matters.

hook.text: You've never noticed good typography. But you've definitely noticed bad typography.

buildup.text: Typography is the art of arranging text so it's readable, functional, and emotionally right.

discovery.text: It's not just font choice. It's size, spacing, alignment, hierarchy ‚Äî every decision about how text looks.

twist.text: Studies show readers judge a website's credibility in 50 milliseconds. Typography drives that snap judgment.

climax.text: Good typography is invisible. Bad typography screams. The goal is to never be noticed.

punchline.text: If you notice the type, it's already failed.

quiz.question: What is the goal of good typography?
options: To be invisible ‚Äî serving content without being noticed
To use the most creative fonts possible
To make text as large as possible
